text: The plan shall further state what actions the agency is taking to secure the equal employment opportunity within the agency of the groups enumerated in § 1-521.03, and of the aging, the young, persons with disabilities, and the homosexual citizens of the District, whether such citizens be actual or potential employees of the District government.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-511.

1973 Ed., § 1-320e.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 19-169 substituted "persons with disabilities" for "the handicapped".

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-63, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-521.01.

For history of Law 19-169, see notes under § 1-307.02.

subchapter.text: Affirmative Action in District Government Employment.
